defaultApp.title: Default App
defaultApp.label: Having a default app allows you to dive straight into that app once you are signed in.

appDescription.title: Setting a default app
appDescription.label: To set or change your default app, drag the desired app inside the designated area above.

__comment: UI-1814: Adding warning for app we can't masquerade
noMasqueradingError: Sorry but this app is only usable with the account you used to log in. Please go back at your account level to use this app normally.
